turn.0: Hi, I'm your automated assistant. I can answer your questions about Hwasong concentration camp.
turn.1: What can you tell me about Hwasong concentration camp?
turn.2: Hwasong concentration camp Hwasong concentration camp (Chosŏn'gŭl: , also spelled Hwasŏng or Hwaseong) is a labor camp in North Korea for political prisoners.
turn.3: What is the English name of the camp?
turn.4: The official name is Kwan-li-so (Penal-labor colony) No. 16.
turn.6: The camp is located in Hwasong County (Myonggan County), North Hamgyong Province in North Korea.
turn.7: Where is the camp in relation to the city?
turn.8: It is situated along the upper reaches of the Hwasong River in a secluded mountain valley.
turn.9: What is the camp surrounded by?
turn.10: The western border is Mantapsan, a mountain.
turn.11: What other surrounding features are there?
turn.12: On the north and east sides, the camp reaches the Orangchon River valley.
